# Solana Ecosystem Submission - Stakefy x402 SDK

## Project Information

**Name:** Stakefy x402 SDK

**Category:** Developer Tools / Payments

**Description:** 
Open-source Solana x402 payment SDK with unique features like payment channels (off-chain micro-payments), @username system (human-readable addresses), and session budgets (pre-approved spending). Lowest fees in ecosystem at 0.1% vs competitors' 1-2%.

**Website:** https://github.com/JaspSoe/stakefy-x402

**GitHub:** https://github.com/JaspSoe/stakefy-x402

**Twitter/X:** https://twitter.com/stakefy

**NPM Packages:**
- Core: https://npmjs.com/package/x402-stakefy-sdk
- React: https://npmjs.com/package/x402-stakefy-react

**Live API:** https://stakefy-x402-production.up.railway.app

**Contact:** sayhello@stakefy.io

## Key Features

1. **Payment Channels** - 100 payments = 1 blockchain tx
2. **@Username System** - Pay to @username instead of addresses
3. **Session Budgets** - No wallet popups
4. **0.1% Fees** - Lowest in ecosystem
5. **100% Open Source** - MIT licensed
